titleStmt.title: The true copy of a letter: written by Mr. Thomas Parker, a learned and godly minister, in New-England, unto a member of the assembly of divines now at Westminster. Declaring his judgement touching the government practised in the churches of New-England. Imprimatur. Ja. Cranford.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Thomas, 1595-1677.

titleStmt.title: The true copy of a letter: written by Mr. Thomas Parker, a learned and godly minister, in New-England, unto a member of the assembly of divines now at Westminster. Declaring his judgement touching the government practised in the churches of New-England. Imprimatur. Ja. Cranford.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Thomas, 1595-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, for Ralph Smith, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the sign of the Bible in Cornhill, neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 4 in the imprint date is crossed out;"Feb: 19 1643".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
